raw_beliefs.text: A carbon tax creates economic incentives to reduce emissions and transition to clean energy
Carbon taxes disproportionately harm low-income families who spend more on energy costs
Market-based solutions like carbon taxes are more efficient than government mandates
Carbon taxes alone are insufficient without direct investment in renewable infrastructure
Revenue from carbon taxes can be returned to citizens as dividends, making it revenue-neutral
Carbon taxes will drive jobs overseas to countries without similar regulations
The cost of climate inaction far exceeds the cost of a carbon tax
